alert.note: Alert for Crane; Terrell; Upton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 9:58PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Pecos, southeastern Ward, central Crane, southern Upton and northeastern Terrell Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 958 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 17 miles southeast of Rankin to 12 miles southwest of Crane. Movement was south at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crane, McCamey, Rankin, Sheffield, Grandfalls, Iraan, Imperial Reservoir, Crane County Airport, Upton County Airport, Bakersfield, King Mountain, Girvin, Royalty, Iraan Municipal Airport, Imperial and Cordona Lake. This includes Interstate 10 between mile markers 263 and 327. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
